participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, she enjoys expressing herself through dance and has a playful side reflected in her childhood memories.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Thomas
participant_2.personality: Curious and passionate about art, he has a deep appreciation for culture and enjoys exploring new flavors.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.
